CustomField.description: The minimum score threshold for reCAPTCHA v3 verification. Scores range from 0.0 (likely bot) to 1.0 (likely human). Google recommends starting with 0.3 and adjusting based on your traffic patterns.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Minimum score (0.0-1.0) required to pass v3 verification. Lower values are more permissive. Default is 0.3.
CustomField.label: Score Threshold
